summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Prospect Street from 19th Avenue North to 23rd Avenue North et al, in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains, under Ordinance No. 12932 creating Local Improvement District No. 1163 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
